title: 1500 Eternal Masterpieces of Fairy Tales: Cinderella, Rapunzel, The Sleeping Beauty, The Ugly Duckling, The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, Aladdin ... Lamp, The Happy Prince, Blue Beard...
description: Here you will find more than 1500 fairy tales, such as "Aladdin", "Sinbad the Sailor", "The Ugly Duckling", "Little Tin Soldier", "The Little Match Girl", "Blue Beard", "Beauty and the Beast", "Puss in Boots", "The Happy Prince", "The Little Mermaid", "Cinderella", "Rapunzel", and "The Sleeping Beauty".
author: Hans Christian Andersen
